issue.title: [Go] ipc FileWriter negative WaitGroup counter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15791](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15791). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When using an `ipc.FileWriter` with the `ipc.WithCompressConcurrency` option a panic occurs due to a negative `WaitGroup` counter in `compressBodyBuffers`.
